name: Brandon Trumble
summary: Senior Full Stack Engineer with 10+ years of experience building scalable, high-performance web and data-driven applications. Python-focused backend developer skilled in Django, Flask, FastAPI, and asynchronous architectures, with strong expertise in React and TypeScript for frontend. Experienced in cloud-native deployments (AWS/Azure), CI/CD, automated testing, and AI/LLM integration. Adept at designing secure, maintainable systems, optimizing performance, and leading cross-functional teams across finance, education, and enterprise domains.

skills: AWS (Lambda, ECS, EC2, S3, CloudFront, RDS, API Gateway)

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
bullets: Architected and delivered end-to-end full-stack systems with a Python-first approach, using Django, Flask, and FastAPI to build high-performance APIs and asynchronous processing pipelines in production environments.
Designed and owned scalable, secure data layers using PostgreSQL, MongoDB, and Redis, including schema design, migrations, indexing strategies, and query optimization under real-world load.
Built and operated RESTful and GraphQL APIs supporting complex business workflows, optimizing for throughput, latency, and long-term maintainability.

Integrated LLM-powered features into production systems using OpenAI APIs and LangChain, designing prompt strategies, inference pipelines, and backend orchestration with reliability and cost awareness.
Led frontend development using React and TypeScript, applying modular architecture, state management patterns, and PWA principles to deliver responsive, maintainable user interfaces.
Implemented robust authentication and authorization mechanisms including JWT, OAuth2, and RBAC, securing distributed services and microservice-based architectures.
Established automated testing and quality practices across the stack using PyTest, Jest, React Testing Library, and Cypress, improving deployment confidence and regression safety.
Deployed and operated cloud-native workloads on AWS and Azure, leveraging serverless services, containers, managed databases, and CI/CD pipelines to support zero-downtime releases.
Drove performance optimization across backend and frontend systems, applying caching strategies, async task processing, bundle optimization, and production profiling.

experience.title: Senior Engineer
bullets: Built and enhanced full-stack applications using .NET Core, React, and Node.js, contributing to both backend services and modern, component-based frontend interfaces.
Designed and optimized relational and non-relational data models using PostgreSQL, T-SQL, and MongoDB, supporting transactional workflows and analytics use cases.
Developed and consumed RESTful APIs, integrating frontend and backend systems with a focus on performance, reliability, and maintainable architecture.
Implemented unit and integration testing across backend and frontend layers using appropriate testing frameworks, improving release confidence and reducing regression issues.
Assisted with data processing and automation tasks using Python, supporting internal tooling and lightweight backend workflows.

experience.title: Software Engineer
bullets: Developed and maintained enterprise-grade education management systems using C# .NET and VB.NET, applying solid OOP principles to improve code maintainability, reusability, and long-term scalability.
Built and optimized SQL Server databases and complex T-SQL queries, stored procedures, and indexes to support high-volume student, financial, and administrative data processing.
Contributed to mobile application development using Apache Cordova and Ionic, delivering cross-platform mobile solutions used by school administrators and educators.
Implemented dynamic, responsive user interfaces with Angular, HTML, CSS, improving usability and consistency across desktop and mobile platforms.
Participated in full SDLC activities, including requirements analysis, system design, development, testing, deployment, and post-release support in a regulated education environment.
Collaborated closely with product managers, QA engineers, and business analysts to translate district-level requirements into reliable technical solutions.
Diagnosed and resolved production issues, performance bottlenecks, and data inconsistencies, improving system stability and reducing support turnaround time.

education.degree: Bachelor’s degree in Computer and Information Science
